column5: Hello  I have plan to rent houseboat for 4 days on north Ontario area from July 15 - 18. I found some houseboat rental site but they have only weekly rental or almost $1600 for 4 days.  Anybody know good and cheap houseboat rental shop around $600 for 4 days?
I don't think you are likely to find any under $1000, especially in peak season.  If you do, be concerned about the quality/state of repair of the equipment they are offering.
The last Houseboating I did was almost 20 years ago and you couldn't get it for that price way back then. $600 for 4 days in peak season just isn't going to happen.
not for that price around the kawarthas thats for sure !!!! get a few more people and split the costs thats what most do,some of those boats will sleep 5-8 people...
Call Darren at Lakeland airways Temagami Ontario He has I think 8 three bouys houseboats
I also rented a house boat about 20 yrs ago for 5 days and it was over a $1000.00 back then plus the cost of fuel good luck i hope you can find something.  Cheers Mitch....
